title: Cursor not visible when Windows pointer trails is turned on

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Bug reports and bugfix pull requests

body:
We're getting close to releasing our game and we're not getting a visible cursor on _some_ 4K monitors. This seems to be dating back over a year, but also with latest GLFW master on Windows.

These seem to be monitors that do 4K in 30 Hz and 1080p in 60 Hz. The cursor doesn't show for desktop size fullscreen windows (4K @ 30 Hz), shows normally for windowed windows. The position is reported correctly, but it is not being rendered, with and without custom cursor images.

Will be investigating further, but can use advice on the debugging approach. Unfortunately I don't have local access to these machines.

And in case someone else experiences the same I'm following this with the machine's dxdiag excerpt :
